welcome_message_body: Welcome to Independence! Get ready to experience the charm of this historic city, known for its rich history and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Independence has to offer.

restaurants.name: The Pink House
restaurants.description: The Pink House is a café located in Independence.

restaurants.name: Starduster Cafe
restaurants.description: Starduster Cafe is a breakfast spot located in Independence.

restaurants.name: Mangiare Italian Restaurant
restaurants.description: Mangiare Italian Restaurant is a italian restaurant located in Independence.

restaurants.name: Yang's Teriyaki Plus
restaurants.description: Yang's Teriyaki Plus is a asian restaurant located in Monmouth.
restaurants.address: 140 Monmouth Ave N (Main st.), Monmouth, OR 97361

restaurants.name: Burgerville
restaurants.description: Burgerville is a burger joint located in Monmouth.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee's Summit Municipal Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lee's Summit Municipal Airport is primarily used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport is where all domestic and international flights are serviced.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Downtown Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as Delta, United, and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Southwest, Alaska, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Frontier, Spirit, and Volaris.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the network 'MCI Free Wi-Fi'.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Johnson Executive Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Johnson Executive Airport is reserved for private and corporate aircraft and offers exclusive services for its passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
